select: SELECT A.TITLE , A.BIGO , DECODE(B.SCENE, 'wh', '창고', '선박') AS SCENE , B.SCENE AS SCENECODE FROM THREE_M A , THREE_D B WHERE A.TITLE = B.TITLE GROUP BY A.TITLE, A.BIGO, B.SCENE
SELECT A.TITLE , A.BIGO , B.WIDTH , B.HEIGHT , B.VERTICAL , B.X_CHUK , B.Y_CHUK , B.Z_CHUK , B.SCENE FROM THREE_M A , THREE_D B WHERE A.TITLE = B.TITLE AND A.TITLE = #{title}
